(beltashasar yanu mage dewiyange namin sadagath namaki.)+ shuddha dewiwarunge balaya ohuta thibe.+ ee nisa ma dutu sihinaya ohuta mama wisthara kalemi. 9 “‘beltashasar, manthara gurukam karana pujakayange pradhaniya+ wana obata shuddha dewiwarunge balaya thibena bawa mama hondin dannemi.+ obata heli karanna bari rahasak natha.+ ebawin mama sihinayen dutu darshana ha eewaye arthaya mata kiya denna.+ 10 “‘ma nidagena sitiddi ma dutu darshanaya meyayi.+ polowa mada wishala gasak+ thibina.

eya ese wuwahoth wega pandu anshaye wenasak sidu wemin dhammika prasad ha nuwan pradip karaliya ta piwisimata ida thibe.kese wethath ada kalagunika ha thanathiruwe thaththwaya adhyayanaya karana thuru kisima thiranayakata elambaimata owun ikman nowanu atha.kadulu laba ganimata samath wanne kumana wega pandu yawanna da yanna shri lanka kandawure pradhana prashnaya wi thibe.paladayi wega pandu praharayaka peramuna ganimata keneku nositime adupaduwa ostreliyanu bhumiye jayagrahanayak athkara ganime shri lankawe nohakiyawa pitupasa thibena nothaka sitiya nohaki tharam balawath sadhakaya wi thibe.ada melbarn deshagunaya yahapath wanu athayi wartha we.

kese wuwada nandaniyage awatharaye katayuthu nisa maha dawalda athuluwa diwa rathri butha katayuthu walin eka eka pirimiya bagin athurudan karana wita, ee bawa danna ara kowile kapu mahatha (mahendra perera) ee siyalla dana dana ohe sitima, waththa balagath darshange (darshan dharmaraj) jiwithaya bili ganimata mayumi (shalani tharaka) bangalawata ena thekma kal marima, piyumi ghathanaya wimata pera labena durakathana amathuma wisandi wu pasu ee durakathana amathuma gath thanaththa piyumi pilibandawa mepamana kal soya nobalima, palamu mithura athurudan wima sadharanaya kirimata “anuradhapurayedi kala wadak“ ada ganima aadi siduwim kipayak nisama sinamawa adala ramuwen pitata gala yama, enam kathawa nogalapima nithaninma siduwe!
